entity.name: Federal Bureau of Investigation
entity.description: All conversation about the United States Federal Bureau of Investigation

text: @realDonaldTrump Something do matter more to Americans than your stupid conspiracy theory against the FBI. Because of your distrust of institutions we are the least equipped to fight Coronavirus. Thanks for the lack of leadership. And yes I do know, the virus wasn’t your fault....
